products.title: Check Out Some Products That Can Obtain Certification

toys.title: Toys
toys.description: Toys require INMETRO certification to ensure children's safety. Certification evaluates risks such as small parts, toxic materials, and sharp edges.
toys.requirements: Mechanical, chemical, and flammability tests according to ABNT NBR NM 300 and ABNT NBR NM 300-3 standards.

school.title: School Supplies
school.description: School materials such as pencils, pens, erasers, and backpacks require certification to ensure they do not contain substances harmful to health.
school.requirements: Chemical analyses and safety tests according to INMETRO regulations.

cookware.title: Cookware
cookware.description: Pots and kitchen utensils must be certified to ensure they do not release toxic substances during use and heating.
cookware.requirements: Heavy metal migration tests and compliance with food safety standards.

walker.title: Baby Walker
walker.description: Baby walkers require rigorous certification due to accident risks. Certification evaluates stability, resistance, and safety.
walker.requirements: Stability tests, mechanical resistance, and compliance with ABNT NBR 15860-1.

highChair.title: High Chair for Children
highChair.description: High chairs must be certified to prevent falls and ensure child safety during meals.
highChair.requirements: Stability tests, safety belt resistance, and compliance with ABNT NBR 15817-1.

stroller.title: Baby Stroller
stroller.description: Baby strollers require certification to ensure safety in brakes, stability, resistance, and absence of entrapment points.
stroller.requirements: Tests according to ABNT NBR 15803-1 and ABNT NBR 15803-2.

carSeat.title: Baby Car Seat
carSeat.description: Car seats are mandatorily certified by INMETRO to ensure protection in case of accidents.
carSeat.requirements: Impact tests, resistance, and compliance with CONTRAN Resolution 277/08.

plasticChair.title: Plastic Monoblock Chair
plasticChair.description: Plastic chairs must be certified to ensure adequate resistance and safety during use.
plasticChair.requirements: Structural resistance tests and compliance with ABNT standards.

about.title: The Ideal Partner to Navigate Certification Processes with Peace of Mind
about.feature1Desc: Proven experience in certifications across major areas and sectors.
about.feature2Desc: Specialized professionals to lead your business to regulatory success.
about.feature3Desc: Tailored service for each client's specific needs.
about.feature4Desc: Consulting for various areas, from electronics to health and telecommunications processes.
about.description1: At Hegemon Consulting, we believe that product certification with INMETRO is more than a technical requirement â€” it's an opportunity to strengthen the credibility, safety, and brand value of each company. Therefore, we offer product certification consulting focused on excellence, transparency, and partnership, helping our clients navigate safely through the universe of conformity assessment and Brazilian technical standards.
about.description2: Our team consists of specialists with extensive experience in regulatory consulting, INMETRO certification, and technical compliance management. We work at all stages of the process â€” from initial diagnosis, document analysis, and laboratory testing monitoring to relationships with accredited bodies. Each project is conducted with technical rigor and personalized, human service, ensuring agility, clarity, and peace of mind for those who trust us.
about.description3: More than providing consulting, our purpose is to create connections of trust and sustainable results. Therefore, our mission is to make INMETRO certification accessible, safe, and efficient, offering solutions that simplify regulatory complexity and strengthen our clients' competitiveness in the market. Each service is a partnership, each certification, a shared achievement.
about.description4: Our values reflect who we are and how we operate: trust as the foundation of every relationship; transparency at every stage of the process; technical excellence that guarantees results; empathy to understand each need; and commitment to transform challenges into achievements. We also believe in constant evolution, because quality and learning go hand in hand.
about.description5: At Hegemon, hegemony is not about being above â€” it's about doing the best, together. We are driven by the purpose of raising standards, promoting safety, and inspiring confidence in every certification. Hegemon Consulting â€“ Certification with purpose, partnership, and results that transform.

compliancePage.title: We Guarantee Your Company Meets All Requirements
compliancePage.subtitle: By your side at every step, ensuring your company understands and complies with all regulatory requirements.
compliancePage.missionText1: At Hegemon Consulting, we understand that navigating the complex world of regulations can be challenging. That's why we offer personalized support that ensures your company not only complies but deeply understands all regulatory requirements applicable to your business.
compliancePage.missionText2: Our commitment is to be by your side at every step of the process, transforming regulatory compliance from a challenge into a competitive advantage.
compliancePage.step1Text: We analyze your company, products and processes to identify all applicable regulatory requirements.
compliancePage.step2Text: We develop a detailed plan with all necessary steps to achieve and maintain compliance.
compliancePage.step3Text: We are present at every step, guiding, clarifying doubts and ensuring everything is done correctly.
compliancePage.step4Text: We train your team so they understand the requirements and can maintain compliance autonomously.
compliancePage.benefit1Text: Be sure you are in compliance with all standards.
compliancePage.benefit2Text: Focus on your business while we handle the bureaucracy.
compliancePage.benefit3Text: Prevent assessments and penalties for non-compliance.
compliancePage.benefit4Text: Strengthen trust with clients and partners.
compliancePage.ctaTitle: Ready to Ensure Your Company's Compliance?
compliancePage.ctaText: Contact us and discover how we can help your company meet all regulatory requirements.

technicalDefensePage.title: Technical Defense in Assessments and Processes
technicalDefensePage.subtitle: Count on our expertise to defend your company in INMETRO, IPEM and other regulatory agency processes.
technicalDefensePage.protectionText1: Receiving an assessment from INMETRO, IPEM or other regulatory agencies can be a critical moment for any company. Our team of experts is prepared to offer the most robust and effective technical defense in the market.
technicalDefensePage.protectionText2: With years of experience and deep knowledge of technical standards and regulatory procedures, we develop personalized strategies for each case, always seeking the best solution for our clients.
technicalDefensePage.situation1Text: Notifications and fines for product non-compliance
technicalDefensePage.situation4Text: Defense in processes with regulatory agencies
technicalDefensePage.howWeActTitle: How We Act in Your Defense
technicalDefensePage.step1Text: We thoroughly study all documentation, assessments and evidence to identify the best defense arguments.
technicalDefensePage.step2Text: We collect reports, certificates, documents and all technical evidence that strengthen your defense.
technicalDefensePage.step3Text: We prepare a robust technical defense, based on standards, regulations and jurisprudence.
technicalDefensePage.step4Text: We file the defense with competent authorities and follow the entire process until the final decision.
technicalDefensePage.step5Text: If necessary, we prepare administrative appeals and provide guidance on applicable legal measures.
technicalDefensePage.differential1Text: Years of experience in technical defenses with major regulatory agencies.
technicalDefensePage.differential2Text: Complete mastery of technical standards, regulations and administrative procedures.
technicalDefensePage.differential3Text: Quick response and strict compliance with procedural deadlines.
technicalDefensePage.differential4Text: Each case is unique and deserves a specific and well-founded strategy.
technicalDefensePage.urgentCtaSubtitle: Defense deadlines are short. Don't waste time!
technicalDefensePage.urgentCtaDescription: Contact us immediately and protect your company.
